dataModel.title: Vegetation Plots Database Component Description: coverIndex
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores the definitions of each coverclass unit associated with each coverclass method.

attribute.attNotes: Primary key for the converIndex table
attribute.attDefinition: Database generated identifier assigned to each unique coverclass associated index value.

attribute.attNotes: Foreign key into the coverMethod table.
attribute.attDefinition: Links to a specific cover scale.
The name or label used in the coverclass scale for this specific specific coverclass.
Upper limit, in percent, associated with the specific coverCode.

This is the lower limit, in percent, associated with a specific coverCode. Where a cover scale has a non-quantitative lower or upper value, as in the "+" of the Braun-Blanquet scale, it is necessary to provide an approximation with "0" being the lower limit of tbe bottom most class.
A middle value (usually mean or geometric mean) between the upperLimit and lowerLimt stored by the database for each taxon observation and used for all coverclass conversions and interpretations.
Description of the specific coverclass. This is particularly helpful in the case that there is no numeric value that can be applied.
